name: World Fresh Water Resources
description: World geography of freshwater resources. Ethics and international principles of human water rights. Uses and abuses of accessible freshwater stocks and wastewater. Case studies of ground water, lakes and rivers (focus: Great Lakes; international watersheds), dams and diversions, water reclamation and reuse. Issues of water quality and quantity for health, and for food production. [24L]
exclusions: cannot take GGR288H5 + GGR348H5 simultaneously GGR334H1
